DOC.criteria: 1 . Male subject age 40 year old , 2 . Subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 30 kg/m² , 3 . Subject body fat percentage 11 27 % weight , measure impedancemetry , 4 . Subject muscle mass index le 55 % weight , measure impedancemetry , 5 . Subject water status , measure impedancemetry , + / 5 liter normal value , indicate impedancemetry , 6 . Healthy subject , register French biomedical research volunteer national database , 7 . Subject whose low limb measurement correspond size grid compression stock use , 8 . Subject agree abstain alcohol intake hospitalization period , 9 . Subject agree abstain strenuous activity , especially sport , screen visit end study ( include outpatient period ) , 11 . Subject accept constraint study , 12 . Subject available whole period study , 13 . Subject sign consent form adequately inform receive information sheet , 14 . Subject affiliated French social security system receive benefit type . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Subject smoker former smoker stop smoke less 6 month ago , 2 . Subject follow saltfree diet , 3 . Subject follow planning follow diet , 4 . Subject temperature ≥ 38,5°C morning , 5 . Subject , upon clinical examination , systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) < 91 mmHg > 139 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) < 41 mmHg > 89 mmHg , heart rate ( HR ) < 40 bpm > 100 bpm , judge clinically significant investigator , 6 . Subject intestinal transit disorder disrupts hydroelectric balance , 7 . Alcoholdependent subject subject positive alcohol breath test , 8 . Subject serious , stabilize , progressive illness ( judged investigator ) , 11 . Subject hypertension heart failure , 12 . Subject know renal function disorder , 13 . Subject know liver failure , 14 . Subject venous insufficiency clinical class C3 , C4 , C5 C6 accord Clinical / Etiological / Anatomical / Pathophysiological ( CEAP ) classification , 15 . Subject follow longterm therapy diuretic , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , steroid , nutritional supplement opiates , 16 . Subject , upon question clinical examination , advanced peripheral neuropathy , skin infection , eczematous dermatitis , weep skin disorder leg , 17 . Subject medical contraindication compression therapy accord interview clinical examination : phlegmatia coerulea dolens , septic thrombosis , intolerance product include selfsupporting band , allergic reaction component , arteritis obliterans low limb , advance diabetic microangiopathy , 18 .
